content:
Nike is a well-established brand in the running shoes market. Their website, <https://www.nike.com>, showcases a wide range of running shoe products for both men and women, with a focus on innovation and technology. Their Twitter account, <https://twitter.com/Nike>, is used to promote new products and collaborations, as well as to engage with customers through contests and giveaways.

Strengths:

* Strong brand recognition and reputation
* Wide range of products catering to different needs and preferences
* Emphasis on innovation and technology in their products
* Active social media presence to engage with customers
* Strong partnerships and collaborations with athletes and influencers

Weaknesses:

* High prices may be a barrier to some customers
* Limited options for customers with specific needs such as wide sizes or orthotics
* Competitors such as Adidas and Under Armour also have strong presence in the market

In terms of creating a new line of running shoes, the brand can focus on differentiating their products through unique design, technology, or targeting a specific niche market. Additionally, the brand can focus on increasing accessibility for customers with specific needs or by offering more affordable options.
